dialog.text: Hey Eddy! You know what you're supposed to look for right?
*sighs* The Cake, remember? The one I told you about. The last time I went out, I saw those humans leaving it on the coffee table outside, in the living room. It should still be there.
dialog.option: Yeah, yeah...remind me again why I'm the one doing this?

dialog.text: We had a bet, and you lost. Besides, you're the main character of this game. So, go out there and have fun!
Oh yeah, I almost forgot. It's been a long time since you've last stepped outside right? You still remember the basics?
You move by holding down the [WASD] keys, and jump by hitting the [SPACEBAR]. Don't ask me why.
You're strong enough to push objects your size and those smaller than you, as well as those made of cardboard and plastic. I think. *Stares at you*
Okay then, the first thing you should do is to repair your grapple. Seems like its hook is broken. Go get a paper clip to fix that. It should still be on the Worktop table there.
Alright, alright, I'll be in touch with you through my telepathy as usual. Be careful~
Hmm, let's see... [WASD] to move, [SPACEBAR] to jump.
Eddy, don't do anything stupid here...
dialog.option: I know, I'm not an idiot.
